title: The Report
creator_credit: Royal North Shore Hospital of Sydney, New South Wales. Dept. of Health, Pamela Scott, Suzy Molony and Tony Wheeler
brief_description: A dramatised film of a day in the life of an assistant personnel manager. An annual report is overdue and as a result of his own inefficiency, the main character allows the day’s events to finally overwhelm him. Ideal discussion promoter about how to organise commitments so as to cope effectively with the demads of work and personal life. Cinematography by Tom Cowan. Written and directed by Tony Wheeler.
